extractFactDictList.sentence: The statue is made up of five parts, with the giant’s outstretched right arm towering 17 feet above the ground, and his bent left leg and knee rise above the earth, while his left hand and right foot just break the surface.

extractFactDictList.question: Who created the work of art at Hains Point?
extractFactDictList.sentence: This striking work of art was created by John Seward Johnson II and was originally installed at Hains Point in Washington, D.C. in However, it was later moved to National Harbor, Maryland.
